Metadata: Mammals of the Sea: a guide to the film
Oregon State University Sea Grant College Program
See: ORESU-V-80-001 for the YouTube video of this16mm film. The National Sea Grant Library does not have the 16mm film.

In 1980, Oregon State University's Sea Grant Program produced a half-hour film about marine mammal controversies along the West Coast of America. This guide goes beyond the film and presents additional information about these volatile issues.
